column1: '''''Middle-earth Role Playing Combat Screen and Reference Sheets''''' is a product for ''[[Middle-earth Role Playing]]'', 2nd Edition. It replaced the ''[[Combat Screen]]''.

In a role playing game, you assume the role of a character in a "living" novel. Middle-earth Role Playing (MERP) and its companion sourcebooks provide the framework for role playing in the greatest fantasy setting of all time... J.R.R. Tolkien's Middle-earth.

The Middle-earth Role Playing Combat Screen is a must for all MERP gamers! Included are all the MERP tables needed for battles, maneuvering, and action. All this on one 34" x 11" combat screen plus two 17" x 11" reference sheets that can double as screen extenders.
